Senthil Narayanaperumal

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/6022118592937315
  • Última atualização do currículo em 11/09/2013

Possui graduação em Química - Manonmaniumsundaranar University (2002), Mestrado pelo Applied Chemistry from National Institute of Technology Tiruchirappalli (2005) e Doutorado em Química (Química Orgânica) pela Universidade Federal de Santa Maria (2010). Possui Pós-doutorado pela Universidade Federal de São Carlos. Tem experiência na área de Química, com ênfase em síntese orgânica, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: síntese de heterociclos, síntese de organocalcogênios via metodologias verdes aplicação de reações de organocatálise na síntese de moléculas bioativas. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Linhas de pesquisa
A Novel Ring Opening Reaction of Epoxides With 1,3- Dipoles


Linhas de pesquisa
1.
Síntese de compostos organocalcogênios utilizando metodologias verdes.
2.
Organocatálise aplicada na síntese de moléculas bioativas.
3.
A Novel Ring Opening Reaction of Epoxides With 1,3- Dipoles
Objetivo: A number of epoxide ring opening reactions have been carried out using various epoxides and dipole nucleophiles. The study describes the ring opening of epoxy alcohol using 1, 3-dipolar species derived from sugar and dimethyl acetylene dicarboxylate with triphenyl phosphine furnished substituted bicyclic nonone and dihydro pyranone moieties rejavascript:void(0)spectively..
4.
Process Research and Development
Objetivo: * Devising new processes, or refining existing ones, to optimize the manufacturing process. * Planning and carrying out process trials in laboratories or pilot plants. * Scaling up the production process via plant trials, making changes to raw materials or components and process parameters to ensure quality is maintained during large-scale production. * Improving yields by reducing costs, for example investigating alternative materials to improve efficiency, quality and yields in bottleneck areas. * Validating new processes and showing that they are an improvement. * Reading and writing technical reports and specifications, and maintaining appropriate batch records. * Initiating and generating ideas based on reading and research. * Developed and scaled-up processes for anti-diabetic drug and anti-cholesterol drug. .
5.
To explore the ring opening reaction of epoxides with new reagent system SiO2.Cl-MX was developed.
Objetivo: To explore the ring opening reaction of epoxides with new reagent system SiO2.Cl-MX was developed. This project was sponsored by the Department of Science and Technology (DST), India..
6.
Bio-and Cheminformatics
Objetivo: The project includes * Elucidation of structures from the names, which are generated before IUPAC nomenclature. That would help in providing IUPAC names to users of the database including researchers, pharmaceutical companies finally helping them in the process of drug discovery and synthesis of new drugs. * The project work involves the literature curation services done by studying the activity studies of various Organic compounds by changing substituent s on the core structure; it also involves the assay types by which the compound can be synthesized. .
